betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Welcome to §2§lGregTech Community Pack§f - §b§lExpert§r.

This modpack is an extension of the original GregTech Community Pack - albeit with tougher recipes, more mods, and extended gameplay over the original pack. This pack strives to add more content through all the tiers (potentially scaling past §dUltimate Voltage§r!), and integrates a number of other popular mods along the way.

Unlike the original Community Pack, you won't just be playing around with GregTech. You'll find yourself dabbling in some §5Magic§r and exploring §6unfamiliar locales§r to make your way to the pack's ultimate goal, and recipes are a little harder this time.

If you're looking for a challenge, you've come to the right place!

§6We've made sure to keep the questbook informative§r, and we'll do what we can to guide you through the numerous changes and tweaks. Remember that you can click on the Eye§r icon to toggle §9View Mode§r to read any quest ahead of time. This is one of many features added by §2Better Questing Unofficial§r, yet another great port of a mod.
